content: this basic dk sock pattern is used in the sock knitting 101 class at sew to speak learn to knit a top down sock with a heel flap & gusset using this pattern materials - 100g dk weight yarn - us 3 / 3 25mm double pointed needles - 2 removable stitch markers - measuring tape - tapestry needle - snips sizes s m l xl measurements 7 8 9 10 numbers refer to the circumference of the ball of the foot you may want to size down one-two sizes if you prefer a tighter fitting sock
